新方法提供了精确测量在血脑屏障上的药物渗透性几十年来，全球的科学家研究了在血脑屏障上准确测量药物渗透性的方法，这是一种紧凑的细胞层，可保护大脑免受潜在危险的物质和微生物的侵害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/new-method-provides-accurate-measurement-measurement-of-drug-permeabialise-cross-across-across-the-blood-brain-brain-brarain-barrier.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/new-method-provides-accurate-measurement-measurement-of-drug-permeabiality-cross-across-across-the-blood-brain-brain-brain-barrier.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7AC51D48-78A7-4181-9383-10DE331C48D8 Tue, 11 Feb 2025 11:18:12 -0500 New method provides accurate measurement of drug permeability across the blood-brain barrier
